DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers blood chemistry value within normal range Age 18 35 year BMI 19 25 kg per m2 Pregnancy lactation Alcohol drug abuse Use dietary supplement medication except contraceptive Any known malignant , metabolic endocrine diseases Previous cardiac infarction Dementia Participation clinical trial within past 1 week prior recruitment Smoking Physical activity 5 h per wk Lactose intolerance Milk intolerance
